item.title: Tiki Fear T-Shirts
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Every once in a while I come up with sick little quotes that I'd love to see on a t-shirt. So instead of jotting them down and going, "hey someday I'll have to throw that on a shirt" I opened a little CafePress shop to collect my ideas. I'm calling it, Tiki Fear Shirts, and it's not for the faint of heart. Here's my first shirt for the line. Enjoy.
